title: Country S borrowing effect on RIR and currency

content.description: Assume that Country S has an open economy and a flexible exchange rate. How will an increase in borrowing in Country S affect its real interest rate, and what will be the resulting effect on the value of Country Sâ€™s currency in foreign exchange markets?
